If you have an account, please sign-in. If you don't, create one here." I've tried to sign out and sign in again. I deleted the token file from my database and installed it again by adding "koken1_" on the admin setup screen. Nothing has helped. How should I proceed?

item.title: Use existing photo directory
item.description:
Hi there,
I've installed Koken as an addon to my Netgear ReadyNAS 314. It already contains my photos from the last few years in a single directory that itself has a sub-directory for each album. How do I point Koken to the existing photos?
Ideally Koken would: - leave the photo files untouched - not waste disk space by duplicating the photos - add uploaded images to the existing directory structure
Can it work this way?
Thank you for your time.
Kind regards, Karl.

item.title: installation
item.description:
I seem to be failing at the first step! I'm installing to a vps with php7 and lighttpd under ubuntu 16.04. The web server runs fine, and I can access web pages I put up there. I created a mysql database. I downloaded the koken installation script .. unzipped it and placed the /koken folder in the root domain (happens to be at /var/www/html).
When I access the url http://yourdomain.com/koken (of course, putting my own domain in there), I get a "403 - Forbidden". I tried moving the index.php out of the /koken directory, put a few random files in there, and my browser when going to yourdomain.com/koken shows the directory contents. So its not the browser not accessing the directory, but seemingly something about the index.php which causes the 403 message.
I've googled, but not found anyone else with the problem. The lighttpd error log has nothing to show.
Any suggestions?

after this Instruction: https://docs.plesk.com/en-US/onyx/administrator-guide/plesk-administration/using-docker.75823
when connecting to my domain (https) i get the set up screen, i'm able to set admin, email and password. clicking next until i got the login screen. it will not take the right credentials, now matter what, on clicking reset password and entering the email nothing happens. aber opening a tab with the site on the homepage i get: "API Error
The theme is not able to make contact with your Koken installation. Contact your host to see if they are blocking loopback connections." what does that mean specifically?

item.title: API Error with SSL reverse proxy and koken 0.22.20
item.description:
I have a koken setup with two servers:
Koken [ip: 10.107.29.182]: HTTP installation with nginx and php-fpm on port 80 Frontend [ip: 10.107.29.61]: SSL proxy that forwards connection to koken and which does SSL termination and which is available on the internet.
With this setup I'm getting Koken API Error: " The theme is not able to make contact with your Koken installation. Contact your host to see if they are blocking loopback connections. "
When looking at the logs I see that koken is able to connect to the server: 10.107.29.182 - - [06/May/2017:11:12:10 +0000] "\x16\x03\x01\x02\x00\x01\x00\x01\xFC\x03\x03;(\xD1\xC02Al\x1C\xF9\x1C\xAA\xFE\xDE\x95\xAE\x09\xBA< curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, 'http' . '://' . $host . self::$location['real_root_folder'] . '/api.php?' . $url); --- > curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, self::$protocol . '://' . $host . self::$location['real_root_folder'] . '/api.php?' . $url);
This way I force koken to access the website over the loopback. Is there a better way to correct this? It seems that `self::$protocol` should be detected from the php connection.

item.title: error 500 after migration
item.description:
Hi,
I changed a hosting provider. So I do the migration as you explain it : - backup database from old server and restore it to the new. - tar /var/www/koken_site and untar to the new server. - my database are the same name and the same user/password, so I needn't to change the storage/configuration/database.php file. - I delete /cache/api and /cache/images folders
Now I have access to /admin. It's work fine. But I can't access to my home (www.andoromeda.fr) I have an Error 500.
May you help me please ?

item.title: Problems Logging In & Changing Settings
item.description:
Right after setting up Koken, I was not able to log into the admin dashboard. I tried reinstalling Koken, and the same issue occurred, I tried resetting my password and most times no email, except ONE time a message showed up saying "This email was not found." Then until I set "Keep me signed in," I was able to log in fine.
Then the welcome splash appeared, and I wasn't able to flip through any of the options at all, no response from the site, and none of the top links work at all. After 5 or 6 refreshes, finally the site became a bit response. Once going to the Settings to check things to change, going to Site Publishing -> Page Title, I got an error saying I don't have privileges to alter this?
And still, I can't login without "Keep me signed in" checked, which is a security issue.

item.title: Unable to login to admin after fresh install
item.description:
Just installed Koken on a fresh install of Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. Install completes successfully but I can't get past the admin login unless I check the "keep me signed in" box. Once I login with that checked, I just get a blank, black screen with some unclickable links at the top.
Google developer console shows these errors:
GET http://koken.alderaan.pw/api.php?/plugins/cache:false 401 (Unauthorized)
Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'length' of undefined at Object.finished (koken-core.js:3045) at Object.r.request.length.e.request.length.n.success (koken-core.js:891) at j (jquery.min.js:2) at Object.fireWith [as resolveWith] (jquery.min.js:2) at x (jquery.min.js:4) at XMLHttpRequest. (jquery.min.js:4)
POST http://koken.alderaan.pw/api.php?/settings 401 (Unauthorized)
GET https://store.koken.me/installs//updates 500 (Internal Server Error)
XMLHttpRequest cannot load https://store.koken.me/installs//updates. No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'http://koken.alderaan.pw' is therefore not allowed access. The response had HTTP status code 500.
Upon a refresh of the page it redirects back to login.
I read through other similar issue pages to no avail.

item.title: HTTP Error upload on NGINX
item.description:
So I was running into an issue where I was getting an error uploading after a new setup with Digital Ocean on LEMP. To resolve the issue you need to do the following:
1. Increase PHP limits by changing upload_max_filesize and post_max_filesize to your desired limit. 2. Set nginx to client_max_body_size 0; in your nginx.conf file.
Restart php-fpm and nginx services, and you should be good to go.
This is purely informational to anyone else running into this issue with NGINX, PHP and Koken. I did a lot of google searching and it took a bit of time to find this answer, especially on the NGINX component.

item.title: Site Description, Keywords
item.description:
Hello,
I wanted to ask how can I update the site description under my name when somebody google my website, for example. I attached a photo. It is something like that right now, but I want to be presented as Plamen Panchev Studios on top (the link) and bellow Fashion and Commercial Photographer from Plovdiv, Bulgaria email: plamenpanchevphotography@yahoo.com tel: +359899967943
Is there anything that can be done? Do I have to wait 15-20 days in order for them to change how it appears as we google my name/website?
What kind of keywords should I include and how many?
Please download the sample photos from the following link: https://wetransfer.com/downloads/b6c6bd133c0820712a41c23b8d1876e620170128132419/bacb1f501cd2a5d6aa2a890c11ff3d6620170128132419/41186e
Thank you! Plamen

item.title: Update
item.description: Hi, at first â thanks for all! I love Koken! But now I have a big problem after the update. My side does not work... Show here: www.rene-gaens.de My database run under version 5.5.52. Is this the problem? How can I change in a new database? I have create a new database in version 5.6.35, but I can't found a setting for changing. Please help me â I need my Site daily ... Thanks! Regards, RenÃ©

item.title: Option of translation koken into another language
item.description:
Hi!
Do I understand correctly that the option of translation koken into another language is possible only in the premium templates?
Thank you in advance!

item.description: Bonjour, j'ai actuellement un nom de domaine que j'ai achetÃ© sur WIX comment faire pour l'utiliser avec vous?

item.title: Reinstallation (Theme and plugins)
item.description:
Hi,
I try to reinstall my token blog in another vm. I have a problem to download the themes and plugins I bough. The others are ok. For instance when I try to reinstall the Madison 2 theme I have the message that the installation is in progress but nothing appears.
Could you help me please. Thx.

item.title: Cart: Where are the buy buttons? They never appear.
item.description:
Despite numerous attempts I can't seem to locate the "buy" buttons or how to configure purchase options. Setup was a breeze, but finding the buttons is very frustrating.
Also, is it true that you can only use the "buy" function from gallery pages (and not blog posts) when it works? If so, super sad and I've just wasted $50. This plugin seems critically underdeveloped.

item.title: Multi-language support
item.description:
Hi!
How affairs with multi-language support?
But please, say straight.

item.title: Offline installer
item.description:
Hi,
As far as i see, the installation process downloads directly the binaries from the web. Is it possible to have a bundle version of koken as my servers, on premises, don't have any access to the Internet.
Do you have any zip file containing the whole product or an alternative installation scheme using docker or similar approach?
Regards

item.title: mcrypt for Mac Sierra
item.description:
Hi there
I tried to install the lovely looking Koken on my Mac Sierra server but it seems that it need the mcrypt mcrypt.so which Apples default install do not have.
I'm not that much into compiling my own things and there for I thought I ask you if you know if there are any precompiled installers of the mcrylt available for the Mac 10.12 Sierra?
Kind regards
Petter

item.title: Move complete koken installation to different folder (on same server)?
item.description:
Is it possible to move an existing koken installation to a different folder (url) on the same server?
Currently I have an instance for testing purposes running on: mydomain.de/koken/
Cause I very satisfied with koken, I want to move this test-instance to my productive website now: mydomain.de/
What steps do I have to take, to to achieve this?
Thanks in advance. Johannes

item.title: Web Hosting
item.description:
Hello, When I try to install Koken with my host "Free" (http://photopus.free.fr/koken/), I never go out of the phase "Testing your server for compatibility... Please Wait" Is Koken compatible with http://sql.free.fr/phpMyAdmin/?
Web Hosting information :
MySQL : Serveur: photopus.sql.free.fr via TCP/IP Version du serveur: 5.0.83 Jeu de caractÃ¨res pour MySQL: UTF-8 Unicode (utf8)
Serveur web Apache Version du client MySQL: 5.1.61 Extension PHP: mysql Version de PHP: 5.3.9
Thank you for your reply. Cordially. Vincent
